name: Skull War
description:
☆☆ 2 Game Modes. ☆☆ 

☆☆ 12 exciting unique levels. ☆☆ 

☆☆  6 Unique power ups, and create combos ☆☆ 

Levels: 
☆ Finish all levels to experience different environments.
☆ Unlock more power ups, which gives more advantage in Nonstop Challenge.

Nonstop challenge: 
☆ Play till death.
☆ Kills as many skulls as you can and gain a spot in leaderboard.

Power ups:
☆ Shield: Fearlessly keep pushing without bouncing back.
☆ Strength: Push twice harder.
☆ Speed up: Gain 2x speed.
☆ Freeze: Freeze all the enemies and push them easily when they can not move.
☆ Black hole: Create black hole that sucks enemies into and instantly kills them.
☆ Death ring: Generate death ring that instantly kills all the enemies around you.

Leaderboards:
☆ Global Leaderboard: Compete with all users across all platform.

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skullwargame
